*div1 type="summary"* *p*John C. Walker to Austin, Clinton, La., September 30, 1830. Inquiring concerning conditions of settlement in Texas. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Clinton Loui*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-30-1830">Sept 30th 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir This is the third letter I have had the honour of addressing you they were upon the subject of your *location_mentioned*cholony */location_mentioned*and [to] enquire after your *person_mentioned*brother James*/person_mentioned*, who I lament to learn died in *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="Summer - 1829"> last summer*/date_mentioned* poore fellow his loss is seriously felt by me My *location_mentioned*fathers house*/location_mentioned* was his home for a year or two, he was my *person_mentioned*bosom friend*/person_mentioned* a youth who Our whole family was as brothers to him and he to them, I wrote to *person_mentioned*James */person_mentioned*two or 3 times My object was to get an account of your *location_mentioned*cholony*/location_mentioned*, I have yet serious notions of joining to your *location_mentioned*cholony*/location_mentioned*, I presume you have filled the stipulations of the contract made by your *person_mentioned*father */person_mentioned*with the *location_mentioned*Mexican nation*/location_mentioned* and that you are prepaired to advise as to the policy Of a poore mans emigrating to your *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, I have every confidence in your candor either interested Or not interested I hope therefore you will as soon as this reaches you answer my letters; to this address (*location_mentioned*Clinton Louisiana*/location_mentioned*) as to the law now in force whether the american people have the right to emigrate and the inducements for so doing whether donations Are made to *person_mentioned*emigrants */person_mentioned*Or not and how much land, and whether there is *location_mentioned*unappropriated lands*/location_mentioned* near you or not—the Character of the Soil and Particularly the health, of the country about you, the most advisable way of getting there with a family, the price of provisions corn, meat etc whether goods wrould be advised to be carried on or whar would be best to carry etc. The distance by land *location_mentioned*from the U. S. line crossing at Nachatochese*/location_mentioned*— By answering this letter you will confer a particular favour—. I have the honour to be*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jno C Walker*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*St. Philippi de Austin Texas*/person_mentioned* Care of *person_mentioned*Missrs. Harrison and Hopkins*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*Kincaid and Cockerill*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Natchitoches*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
